sentences.en: And the bonny boats are sailing, way down by Doorin shore.
sentences.cn: 沿着多里安海岸, 美丽的船儿在航行.

sentences.en: And to the bonny Bann banks forever I ll bid adieu.
sentences.cn: 我对神发誓,我永远都不会说再见.

sentences.en: Bonny , take the next dirt track on the left.
sentences.cn: 邦妮, 走左边下一条泥土路.

sentences.en: Bonny : You looked very silly yesterday making faces at the bulldog.
sentences.cn: 你昨天冲着牛头犬做鬼脸看起来很傻.

sentences.en: Bonny Zeng graduated from Hunan Normal University with a Master Degree.
sentences.cn: 湖南师范大学英语语言文学硕士.

sentences.en: Bonny, take the dirt track on the left.
sentences.cn: 邦妮, 走左边那条泥土路,它可以将我们带到山谷里.

sentences.en: Don't be hard on the bonny lass.
sentences.cn: 别对这个漂亮的小姑娘这么凶吧.

sentences.en: Facing new century, Bonny's person heroic feelings so farsighted. "
sentences.cn: 面对新世纪,邦力人豪情万丈, 志在千里 .

sentences.en: Her baby has bonny and bright blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子有一双美丽而明亮的蓝眼睛.

sentences.en: I hear tell she was very bonny.
sentences.cn: 据说她过去长得很标致.

sentences.en: It's a man bonny muscle with good shape in adroit movement.
sentences.cn: 这个男人肌肉结识、身体健硕、敏捷如豹.

sentences.en: JACKIE: Bonny, take the next dirt track on the left.
sentences.cn: 杰克: 邦妮, 走左边附近那脏的车道.
告诉我, 美丽的鸟儿.

trans.tran_cn: 1。<尤苏格兰和英格兰北部>健康的，活泼的，愉快的，（尤指婴儿）胖乎乎的
